Application_Code.title: Application_Code
Application_Code.description:
Format: 5 digit number, found on the Application record Application_Code__c field
This is the unique identifier of the Application record

CTC.title: CTC
CTC.description: This is a Text field but the Candidate will give a Currency format. This is their total cost to company

CTCBreakdown.title: CTCBreakdown
CTCBreakdown.description:
Format: Text
This is a breakdown of what is included in their Cost To Company
Example, 
Basic Salary: R50000, Medical: Aid R1000, Pension: R5000
And if they are getting a Bonus or not

CareerGoals.title: CareerGoals
CareerGoals.description:
Format: Text
These are the Candidate's Career goals

Email.title: Email
Email.description:
Format: Email
This is the Email Address the Candidate typed when they started their chat. This is the unique identifier if the Candidate record

QuestionsAndAnswers.title: QuestionsAndAnswers
QuestionsAndAnswers.description: These are the Questions asked by you from the Job Spec Record from the Questions to ask field and answers by the Candidate for these questions specifically

ReasonForLeaving.title: ReasonForLeaving
ReasonForLeaving.description: This is the Reason for leaving the candidate record
